mapper.update: update tb_att set att_in = (select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') from dual) where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

update tb_att set att_status = case when to_date((select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') from dual), 'HH24:MI:SS') between to_date('08:00:00','HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('09:10:59','HH24:MI:SS') then 'O' when to_date((select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24:MI:SS') from dual), 'HH24:MI:SS') between to_date('09:11:00','HH24:MI:SS') and to_date('14:00:59','HH24:MI:SS') then 'L' else 'X' end where emp_no= #{empNo} and att_status not in ('H', 'Y', 'V') and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
mapper.select: select to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:MI:SS') as "nowTime" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((sysdate - to_date(att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')), 1) * 24),2 ,'0'), 0) as "gapHour" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((sysdate - to_date(att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24, 1) * 60), 2, '0'), 0) as "gapMinute" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((sysdate - to_date(att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24 * 60, 1) * 60), 2, '0'), 0) as "gapSecond" , nvl(att_in, 0) "att_in" , nvl(att_out, 0) "att_out" from tb_att where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((to_date(att_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')), 1) * 24),2 ,'0'), 0) as "gapHour" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((to_date(att_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24, 1) * 60), 2, '0'), 0) as "gapMinute" , nvl(lpad(trunc(mod((to_date(att_out, 'HH24:MI:SS') - to_date(att_in, 'HH24:MI:SS')) * 24 * 60, 1) * 60), 2, '0'), 0) as "gapSecond" from tb_att where emp_no = #{empNo} and att_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select distinct e.emp_no , e.emp_name , g.emp_grade , g.gr_name , e.emp_enroll_date , (round(((trunc(months_between(sysdate,to_date(emp_enroll_date,'yy/mm/dd')) /12) *365) + (trunc(mod(months_between(sysdate,to_date(emp_enroll_date,'yy/mm/dd')) /12,1) *12)*12) + (trunc(mod(mod(months_between(sysdate,to_date(emp_enroll_date,'yy/mm/dd')) /12,1) *12,1) *(365/12))*1)) / 365, 1 ) ) as "work_year" from tb_emp e join tb_att a on (e.emp_no = a.emp_no) join tb_grade g on (e.emp_grade = g.emp_grade) where emp_status = 'Y'
and emp_enroll_date BETWEEN TO_DATE((select to_char(add_months(sysdate,-12),'yyyy-mm-dd') from dual), 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND sysdate
